sentences.english: Babies tumble when they are learning to walk.
sentences.chinese: 幼儿在学走路时常常跌倒。

sentences.english: Dates become a series of business negotiations, often hard-nosed.
sentences.chinese: 约会成为一系列商务谈判，常常就像讨价还价。

sentences.english: Often, they are cold-pressed and extracted from fatty portions of vegetables.
sentences.chinese: 常常，他们冷压萃取脂肪和部分蔬菜。

sentences.english: In the Entomology research, counting the individual numbers of Insects often frustrate the workers.
sentences.chinese: 昆虫学研究中常常会遇到对昆虫数量进行统计的工作。

sentences.english: Some of the women-teachers are usually proud of their position of being a Diana.
sentences.chinese: 有些女教师常常以保持独身主义地位而自豪。

sentences.english: Within the informal work method of RUP, this is often unnecessary.
sentences.chinese: 在RUP方法的正式工作中，这常常是不必要的。

sentences.english: When you go to a new school, you don't know the ground rules of how you are supposed to behave.
sentences.chinese: 当你进入一所新学校，常常不知道有何遵循的规矩。

sentences.english: We often do not observe their own Fono.
sentences.chinese: 我们常常不守自己的福诺。

sentences.english: It's common to mistake simplicity for lack of power.
sentences.chinese: 人们常常将简洁性误解为缺乏功能。

sentences.english: Motorcyclists and bicyclists are often the victims in such cases.
sentences.chinese: 机车与脚踏车骑士常常是这种状况的牺牲者。

sentences.english: Presently, Topics of cars are hanging on my lips. One in three words escaping from my lips has something to do with cars.
sentences.chinese: 现在，嘴边常常念叨着车，三句话离不开车的话题。

sentences.english: Underground engineering is frequently threatened by ground water irruption.
sentences.chinese: 地下工程常常面临突水灾害的威胁。

sentences.english: It is often said that Hollywood is  high school with money.
sentences.chinese: 人们常常说说好莱坞就是“纸醉金迷的高中”。

sentences.english: andeven those of their own instituting they frequently infringe.
sentences.chinese: 甚至连自己定下的规则也常常违背。

sentences.english: She used to travel with a circus.
sentences.chinese: 她过去常常用一个马戏场旅行。

definition: usually/in many cases/more often than not
